context.name: Chiappa Rhino 120DS 9MM Long Barrel Revolver
context.excerpt: The Chiapp Rhino 120DS Long Barrel Pistol is the most innovative development in revolver technology in years.
context.content:
The Chiappa Rhino 120DS Long Barrel Revolver is one of the most innovative developments in revolver technology in years. The Chiappa Rhino is a good looking and modern long-barreled revolver that refuses to be constrained by tradition and design limitations.

Chiappa have made improvements that move the revolver forward into the 21st century. The Rhino fires from the bottom of the cylinder rather than the top, dramatically reducing muzzle rise and recoil felt, by lowering the axis of the bore almost to the palm of the shooter's hand. Also an aluminium alloy frame and barrel shroud make the Rhino lightweight and easy to carry.

 

Chiappa Rhino 120DS 9mm Long Barrel Revolver Features:

12” 1:12” twist barrel
Black anodised Aluminium barrel sleeve
Electroless Nickel finish
Adjustable Fibre-Optic sights
9mm (with full moon clips)
Walnut grip
Weight 1155g
